message: Let's split it down the middle, no need for further negotiations.
I'll take the majority, you can have the rest.
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! I'll give you a chance to reconsider.
Meet me halfway, Bob. You'll still get a decent chunk, but I'll get a fair share too.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small consolation prize.
That's not even close to fair, Bob. I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm not backing down, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're getting low, I'm taking the majority now.
You're being ridiculous, Bob. I'm not giving up that easily. It's time to make a serious offer or walk away.
This is my final, final offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a decent share. Take it or we're done.
I'll take it all, you can leave.
You're not getting away with taking everything, Bob! I'd rather walk away with nothing than let you take it all.
Game over, Bob. You win. I concede.
